      • EmotionClassifier

    • Method Detail

      • classifyFile

        public Measure[] classifyFile​(java.lang.String fileName)
        Reads, processes, classifies an amount of frames defined in a .csv file which should match the CSVImporter. Uses printClassificationResult for printing the result which is also returned for debug purposes . The conversion happens through three abstract layers: csvmodel to featuremodel to facialexpressionmodel
        Parameters:
        fileName - path to the .csv file with the frames in it.
        Returns:
        the measured emotions, null if fail

      • classifyFrame

        private Measure classifyFrame​(FeatureFrame frame,
                              FacialExpressionDescriptor descriptor)
        Uses the Dempster-Shaefer implementation provided from the excerise to classify a frame into an emotion.
        Parameters:
        frame - The filtered, merged and normalized FeatureFrame to classify
        descriptor - the descriptor, trained with the first n balanced sets of frames.
        Returns:
        The best measure as a result of the dempster implementation. This will be the classified frame.

      • printClassificationResult

        private void printClassificationResult​(Measure emotion,
                                       int i)
        Prints a classified emotion to the systems standard output stream (console). Every frame is printed on a new line. The main interest of a classification is the measured emotion.
        Parameters:
        emotion - the result of the dempster shaefer implementation
        i - the index of the frame for cleaner visual appearance
